title: Yertle the turtle; Gertrude McFuzz; The Big brag
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Dr. Seuss video classics". King Yertle is not satisfied with just being King. He wants to rule over his land from a great height. Climbing on the backs of his turtle subjects in order to expand his kingdom, turns out to be a bad idea. Gertude McFuzz is envious of her pretty feathered friends and tries to find a magical solution. A rabbit and bear bicker and boast "The Big brag", until a wise old worm teaches them both a lesson! The three stories are delightfully narrated by actor John Lithgow.
related_objects: Series; S01236; Dr. Seuss video classics; Active; 1992
